jobDescriptions.title: Senior Backend Developer
jobDescriptions.description: We are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to design and implement scalable microservices architecture. You will work with Java, Spring Boot, and cloud technologies to build high-performance systems serving millions of users.
responsibilities: Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservices
Lead code reviews and mentor junior developers
Collaborate with frontend and DevOps teams

jobDescriptions.title: ML Platform Engineer
jobDescriptions.description: Join our ML Platform team to build and maintain infrastructure for machine learning workloads at scale. You will design model serving systems, feature stores, and MLOps pipelines.
responsibilities: Build and maintain ML training infrastructure
Design feature store and model registry

jobDescriptions.title: Full Stack Developer
jobDescriptions.description: Looking for a Full Stack Developer to work on our e-commerce platform. You will build features across the entire stack, from React frontend to Node.js backend, handling high-traffic scenarios.
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications with React
Integrate payment systems and third-party services

jobDescriptions.title: DevOps/SRE Engineer
jobDescriptions.description: We need a DevOps Engineer to improve our deployment pipelines and system reliability. You will manage Kubernetes clusters, implement monitoring solutions, and automate infrastructure.
responsibilities: Set up monitoring, alerting, and logging

jobDescriptions.title: Security Engineer
jobDescriptions.description: Join our security team to protect financial systems and customer data. You will conduct security assessments, implement security controls, and respond to security incidents.
responsibilities: Conduct penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
Implement and manage security tools (SIEM, WAF)
